name: Reversible Fingerless Glove - Dahlia on Indigo
description: Hand knitted and embroidered reversible glove. You will not be disappointed♥ One side has a embroidered dahlia on blue. Just turn it inside out, you will now have a glove with beautiful colored stripes on powder blue. They can be worn either way depending on your mood! These are completely seamless, super warm and cute to boot! 100% my original design. Knitted with soft 100% pure wool. Made in an absolutely smoke-free environment. This glove would fit the majority of hand sizes. You can see more photos of this item HERE. ♦SIZE♦ Total height: 20cm (7.8") Width (just above the thumb): 10cm (4") ♦WASHING INSTRUCTIONS♦ Do not bleach Cool iron 110o max Dry cleanable - stable in Perchloroethylene, and hydrocarbons, without restriction Dry flat Do not tumble dry Handwash ♦The item is shipped from the UK♦ Thank you for shopping!
